'' Setting colors in grid on Part properties : state, classification
Dim i As Integer
For i=0 To Me.getItemCount()-1
Dim bg_color_state As String
Dim myCss As String
Dim thisItem As Item = Me.getItemByIndex(i) Dim thisStatus As String = thisItem.getProperty("state","")
'------ Select (thisStatus) Case "Preliminary","Review" bg_color_state = "#FFFFBB" 'light yellow Case "Approved" bg_color_state = "#99CC33" 'light green Case Else bg_color_state = "" 'none End Select
If bg_color_state <> "" Then myCss = ".state { background-color: " & bg_color_state & " }" 'myCss &= ".classification { background-color: " & bg_color_classification & "; text-indent: 5px;}" thisItem.setProperty("css",myCss)
End If Next i Return Me
